content:
► "This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty."
► Page: https://www.facebook.com/AlexanderDrakePage

Hiccup was my big come-back into cosplay! I loved the movie SO MUCH! I never worked on an armor before, so it was pretty challenging, but I hope it turned out pretty good! This will always be my favourite costume above all the others I made, and I guess it will always be!
Hiccup cn: AlexanDrak
